pkgmetadata.longdescription: JMuPdf is a Java library for rendering PDF, XPS and CBZ (Comic Book) documents. It can render pages and export them into various formats as well as generate a Java buffered image. It has the ability to render the whole page or sections (cropping). It can also extract page text, links, outlines, etc.
